doc.description: Video streaming for the Bebop front camera

define.name: BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_SHOT_PATH
define.description: Path where the images should be saved

configure.name: BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_BROADCAST
configure.description: Enable broadcast of image stream (default: TRUE)

makefile.raw:
include $(CFG_SHARED)/udp.makefile
BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_HOST ?= $(MODEM_HOST) BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_PORT_OUT ?= 6000 BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_BROADCAST ?= TRUE
BEBOPVIEWVID_CFLAGS = -DBEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_HOST=$(BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_HOST) -DBEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_PORT_OUT=$(BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_PORT_OUT) ifeq ($(BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_USE_NETCAT),) ap.CFLAGS += $(BEBOPVIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DBEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_BROADCAST=$(BEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_BROADCAST) else ap.CFLAGS += $(BEBOPVIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DBEBOP_FRONT_CAMERA_USE_NETCAT endif
